title: PMS IT CONTROLS- CHECK CLIENT DATA INTEGRATION ON PMS
time_sequence: CO - TRANSMISSION OF DATA TO SATELLITES (PMS, BTP, TARIF, ACB)

task_list.instruction_title:
Execute PMS Client Data integration IT Controls: 
Report results by email.

C9047 : Breakdown count of clients per Relationship Manager

C9048, : Number of third-partys per Legal Form

C9049 : Number of third-party per Currency ISO code

C9050, : Number of persons per country of nationality

C9051 : Number of persons per country of domicile

C9052 : Number of high risk PEP persons

C9053 : Number of managed accounts per risk profile

C9054 : Number of third-parties under a discretionnary mandate and with no portfolio manager or no risk profile assigned
Validate PMS Client Data integration control results.
